name: Fourth Link
description:
Keyboard keys.

What were to happen if the way they usually work changed?

What if  the "UP" and "LEFT" keys became one?

What if the "RIGHT" arrow also triggered "SPACE"?

A simple game with only 6 keys to press through 20 levels.

6 keys that now overwrite the keyboard's rules.

Will you be able to master these links?

Controls:

Arrow Keys -  Move

Space - Restart Level

Alt - Slow Down

Made for the Game Maker's Tool Kit Game Jam 2021 using Game Maker Studio 2.

Theme: Joined Together
